rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small foyer leading to an open living-dining-kitchen area, designed for social gatherings and daily activities.
A dedicated workspace integrated into the living area with a semi-private layout, featuring ample natural light and ventilation.
A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden, designed for relaxation and privacy.
A comfortably sized bedroom for guests, featuring a balcony and adjacent storage space.
A modern bathroom adjacent to the guest bedroom, with efficient plumbing and ample storage.
A compact utility space for cleaning and storage, integrated within the layout.

openings.description: A large, welcoming door aligned with Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow.
Large windows in bedrooms and living areas for natural light, following Vastu recommendations for appropriate positioning.
Integrated balcony doors in each bedroom to ensure privacy and natural light, adhering to Vastu guidance.
Strategically placed window in the home office for optimal light and ventilation, as per Vastu principles.
Smooth transitions between rooms with doors placed according to Vastu flow for energy circulation.

vastu_summary.alignment: Contemporary design aligns with traditional Vastu principles by ensuring proper room orientation, natural light, and ventilation.
vastu_summary.energy_flow: Optimized for a balanced energy flow throughout the living spaces.
